name: Boots of Mana
passive: 18 bonus physical damage to minions. 1400 Boots of Mana TIPS: These boots boost your ability power, mana regeneration, and movement speed. The “Magic Break” passive grants extra magic penetration for more potent spells against resistances. “Big Bully” speeds up waveclear by dealing bonus damage to minions with attacks and abilities. The new “Equilibrium” passive gives champions without mana a strong health regeneration boost, enhancing their survivability in prolonged engagements. — A great pick for mage mid laners and supports who need frequent spellcasting, wave control, mobility, and added staying power.

These boots boost your ability power, mana regeneration, and movement speed.
The “Magic Break” passive grants extra magic penetration for more potent spells against resistances.
“Big Bully” speeds up waveclear by dealing bonus damage to minions with attacks and abilities.
The new “Equilibrium” passive gives champions without mana a strong health regeneration boost, enhancing their survivability in prolonged engagements.
